0.post_text: Friday morning. Minutes to the weekend. Coffee in hand. Life couldn’t get much better than this.

1.post_text:
Hailing from the esteemed coffee region of Antigua Valley, Guatemala, the elegant Casi Cielo blend was first developed with world-renowned chefs for a ‘fine-dining’ experience. 

Rich with flavor and smooth in texture, its lemon and dark cocoa notes perfume the brew - a perfect companion with cheeses, rich chocolates and good dinner conversation. Available in stores, while stocks last. 

Learn about our seasonal coffees: http://bit.ly/seasonalcoffees

2.post_text:
Attention denizens of Clarke Quay!

You may have noticed the partial closure of our store at Central today. Have no fear, we're still open to brew your favorite Starbucks cuppa.

We are extending and renovating the store and are currently operating from our extended space a few steps away. Don't forget to head on down today and say hello!

The Central store fully opens in mid-March.

6.post_text:
Happy Valentine’s Day everybody! We now have past the 200,000 mark on Facebook and we’re spreading the love with you.

We’re selecting 20 random fans to receive an exclusive limited edition Starbucks Mini Card fully stocked with $20 cash value to be used at any Starbucks stores in Singapore, except our stores at Changi Airport. 

Winners will be announced at 5pm later today!

7.post_text:
Happy Lunar New Year to everyone! Here’s hoping that prosperity brews nicely for you in the Year of the Snake. May your long weekend bring much joy and warmth. 

Do remember that some of our stores will be open during this festive period if you do fancy yourself a cuppa.

Opening hours available here: http://bit.ly/starbuckscnyhours

8.post_text:
2 days to the first day of the Lunar New Year… are you excited yet! 
We hope you’ve all stocked up your wardrobes with fresh pieces for a time of reunion and visitation – but if you do wish to catch a coffee break in between, we’re right here for you!
 
Check out the brewing hours of your favourite Starbucks this festive season at www.starbucks.com.sg.

14.post_text:
Soy green tea latte has all the wonders of an unassumingly good comfort-drink. A subtle blend of green tea and soy milk – artfully crafted, perfectly balanced and wonderfully heart-warming. 
Get yourself a cup if you have yet to do so. Psst.. We think the iced version makes a refreshing alternative too!

15.post_text:
For those who have yet to bag these yummy Starbucks-exclusive Festive Lunar New Year Treats, now is the time.
As we countdown to the Lunar New Year, we’re giving you some extra goodies!
With every Cookie Gift Set purchased from today, you will enjoy a complimentary tall-sized beverage of your choice & a pack of those lovely golden snake-themed red packets. While stocks last.  
 
Featuring a carefully curated mix of east-meets-west, balance the oriental flavor of our Caramel Pineapple Tarts with the unique Coffee Pineapple Tarts, Sable Cookies, and wash it all down with your very own home-brewed Starbucks House Blend VIA® Ready Brew. 
Get yours today for $28.80

Happy Friday! :)
For those who haven’t heard, Brandon Lee’s 2nd album, titled ‘Back Against the World’, is out. The local crooner will be serenading coffee-lovers for the last time this January. Catch Brandon at his FINAL set tomorrow at Starbucks Raffles City, 4PM.
Brandon's CD can be found in all our stores or do check out his music at http://www.facebook.com/home.php#!/BrandonLeeBand  
See you tomorrow!

18.post_text:
Hi guys, we have been hearing some confusion from everyone.
Let us clarify on the Year of the Snake Facebook Contest!

Here's what you need to do:
- Tell us why YOU Absolutely Love Starbucks
- Post this as your STATUS on your Facebook page
- Garner as many LIKES as you can 

What you need to send us: 
1. A SCREENSHOT of your profile page/timeline which captures the STATUS UPDATE you posted telling us why you love Starbucks. The 24 fans whose post garners the MOST likes win.

2. A scanned, clear image of the front&back of your NRIC which reflects that you are born in the year of the snake.
 
Where to send to:
marketing@starbucks.com.sg

Date to start sending entries:
Once you think you have enough LIKES to let you win!

Contest closes:
31st January (Thu), 12PM

19.post_text:
To all Starbucks fans born in the year of the Snake, this is YOUR Year. 

We’re giving you lots of heads up this time – here’s the deal. Post a liner on your profile telling us Why You Absolutely Love Starbucks. Then, send us a screen shot plus proof that you’re a snake baby by Jan 31st to marketing@starbucks.com.sg and the 24 fans with the most likes on his/her post will win a set of the Year of the Snake Starbucks Bearista® and a 16oz gold Snake Skin tumbler on us. 

Yes, you’re welcome, snake babies! :)

P/S: Prize winners would need to collect their prizes personally.

20.post_text:
Our dear friends, if you didn’t already know, Starbucks has something exciting in stores for you again. Since this be the season of new beginnings, celebrate it with a hot cuppa Hojicha Tea Latte, smooth Japanese green tea roasted to perfection, combined with freshly steamed milk and topped with velvety foam. 

For those who have tried the hot version, why not opt for its chilled counterpart, the Iced Hojicha Tea Latte. A cool, smooth and refreshing alternative.

24.post_text:
Guys, come learn a thing or two about what’s the difference between TEA and COFFEE tasting here at Starbucks. 
Tea, coffee’s lesser known caffeinated beverage sibling, is quite the underdog for most people looking for a perk-me-up. During this session, Starbucks lets you in on a bit more about our in-house tea offerings. 

Taste the difference as we let guests sample our teas and this season’s exclusive coffee. Let us tell you a bit about our current favourite brew – the Guatemala Casi Cielo™. 

If this sounds like a good way to spend a Sat afternoon, sign right up! :) 

The seminar happens at: 
- Starbucks Capital Tower
   168 Robinson Road #01-01/02
   Singapore 068912
- 19 Jan (Sat)
- 3 to 4.30pm 

RSVP with us, along with your contact details, at marketing@starbucks.com.sg – Seats are limited, so hurry!
